import React, {useState, useRef} from 'react'; export default function LocationFrame({video,descr,img}){ const [play, setPlay] = useState(false); const ref = useRef(null); console.log(play); return( <>
ref.current.play()} onMouseLeave={function(){ if(ref != null){ ref.current.stop(); } } }>

{descr}
